question_texts: A high frequency signal would require a lower sampling rate than a low frequency signal to capture much of the information contained in the original analog signal.

question_texts: In an RC high pass circuit, the output is in-phase with the input.

questions.question_text_1: Two capacitors of capacitance C1 =5 μF and C2 =10 μF are connected in series and a voltage of 60 V is applied across this combination until steady state has been attained. The capacitors are now disconnected and rewired such that the plates with the same polarity are joined together making a parallel connection. Assume no charge is lost in this process. Answer the given subquestions.
